img.title: COVID 19
img.span: All updates will be passed along as quickly as possible. Please see the following links for more information.

span.br:
Click here to read a statement from Mr. Brian Hukel, Scott County Central Schools Superintendent, regarding COVID-19 and school closures. Update as of April 3, 2020.
Click here to read a statement from Mr. Brian Hukel, Scott County Central Schools Superintendent, regarding COVID-19 and school closures. Update as of March 30, 2020.
Click here to read a statement from Mr. Brian Hukel, Scott County Central Schools Superintendent, regarding COVID-19. Update as of March 17, 2020.
Click here to read the Press Release regarding school closure that was released on the evening of March 16, 2020.
Click here to read a statement from Mr. Brian Hukel, Scott County Central Schools Superintendent, regarding COVID-19. Update as of March 16, 2020.
Other Information regarding COVID-19
Click here for up to date information regarding COVID-19 from the Missouri Department of Health and Senior Services.
Click here for up to date information regarding COVID-19 from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).
Click here to see the Scott County Department of Health website.
The DHSS hotline, staffed by nurses and other health care professionals, is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week at: (877) 435-8411.
